name: Plank Shoulder Tap
setup: High plank: hands under shoulders, feet shoulder-width for stability
steps: Lift one hand to tap opposite shoulder while resisting hip shift
Place hand back under shoulder and repeat other side
Maintain steady breathing and rigid torso
safety: Elevate hands to a bench/box if wrists or core strength limit position.

prescriptionHints.notes: Wider feet reduce sway; prioritize trunk stiffness.

joints.notes: Stack joints and keep neutral spine.
